verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O Zion, haste, your mission high fulfilling, To tell to all the world that God is Light; That He Who made all nations is not willing One soul should perish, lost in shades of night.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Publish glad tidings, tidings of peace; Tidings of Jesus, redemption, and release.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Behold how many thousands still are lying, Bound in the darksome prison-house of sin, With none to tell them of the Saviour's dying, Or of the life He died for them to win.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Proclaim to ev'ry people, tongue and nation That God in Whom they live and move is love: Tell how He stooped to save His lost creation, And died on earth that man might live above.

verse.name: v4
